title: Did you forget something Riot?
body:
You said from now on OCE would be getting patches on Wednesday mornings... seems to me, 4am Thursday isn't Wednesday morning...

> Starting with patch 5.16, Oceania will be the first region in the world to receive future patches. Our patch day will now be Wednesday mornings instead of Thursday mornings.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/t2vBl3Ec-upcoming-change-to-patch-day

replies.body:
Hi,

Well spotted :)

Technically, we're still going first - it is just that the global release of 5.16 was pushed back by a day, to ensure final fixes and testing were complete beforehand.

Cheers!
Mindstar
[This thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/jNJ3VRf9-scheduled-maintenance-patch-516-20082015) will have the most up to date info on the 5.16 release
I'm pretty sure the sheer amount of new content on this patch is well more than enough to compensate {{champion:82}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:72}}

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TkKlPIa7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-19T06:20:24.844+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure the sheer amount of new content on this patch is well more than enough to compensate {{champion:82}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:72}}

no.
no it won't.
ruining 2 champs and making 1 ridiculously broken will not make up for it.
You haven't even played these champs yet, how can you tell if theyre ruined or broken? Also, which champs are you referring to?

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TkKlPIa7,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-08-19T07:08:40.767+0000)
>
> You haven't even played these champs yet, how can you tell if theyre ruined or broken? Also, which champs are you referring to?

they're ruining mordekaiser by forcing him to either be botlane, or be useless. not to mention the ridiculous damage on his q, you get 3 q'd autos off on their adc and they're dead. They're ruining skarner by giving him a gimmick with the shrine things in the jungle.
With both these changes, they're shoehorning these champs into certain positions.

Darius is going to be super broken with his new passive as well, especially now that it's physical damage.

> [{quoted}](name=Infected Walnut,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TkKlPIa7,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T08:09:11.750+0000)
>
> they're ruining mordekaiser by forcing him to either be botlane, or be useless. not to mention the ridiculous damage on his q, you get 3 q'd autos off on their adc and they're dead. They're ruining skarner by giving him a gimmick with the shrine things in the jungle.
> With both these changes, they're shoehorning these champs into certain positions.
> 
> Darius is going to be super broken with his new passive as well, especially now that it's physical damage.

I don't want to say this about you but this is the sort of braindead shit that has been coming from 40% of the community who don't read the patch notes properly. Yeah big changes that look like buffs are coming out but Daruis and Garen are getting huge stat nerfs to compensate (they cut over 20% off Daruis's late game base damage and now his q handle damage does not hemmorage (no more e q combo's for insane damage into ult), I have not read up on Garen because I don't believe he was that broken looking.

> [{quoted}](name=Infected Walnut,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TkKlPIa7,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T08:09:11.750+0000)
>
> they're ruining mordekaiser by forcing him to either be botlane, or be useless. not to mention the ridiculous damage on his q, you get 3 q'd autos off on their adc and they're dead. They're ruining skarner by giving him a gimmick with the shrine things in the jungle.
> With both these changes, they're shoehorning these champs into certain positions.
> 
> Darius is going to be super broken with his new passive as well, especially now that it's physical damage.

They upped the damage on Skarner's Q, increased how much W shields for, removed having to mark a champion 3 times before you can stun them to an instant E and basic attack opponent to stun. They also lowered his mana, so he won't run out as much as before (which makes the 3% mana regen on his passive a bit overkill), they made it so when he ults a target he gains 100 movement speed, so he can drag them even further now. Who cares if you think Skarner's crystals are gimmicky, he has a lot of power without them.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TkKlPIa7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-19T06:20:24.844+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure the sheer amount of new content on this patch is well more than enough to compensate {{champion:82}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:72}}

Yep, also a day late is better than a week and if we were still on our old patching time, we'd be getting it Friday instead of Thursday.
riot forgot to permabn you off fourms
